title: Data Science Project Workflow
subject: Data Science
theory: Putting it all together. 1. Define Business Goal on day 1. 2. Get Data. 3. Clean/EDA. 4. Build MVP Model. 5. Iterate/Tune. 6. Present results to stakeholders.

common_mistakes.correction: Spending months building a churn model when the business wanted an acquisition model.

summary: A disciplined workflow converts technical skills into business impact.
